txt.en: Chests and fallen foes can be looted. Right-Click the container, then right-click the items to loot them.

Containers and fallen foes can be looted. Look for sparkly effects to indicate that an object has loot on it. <rgb=#FFFF00>Right-click</rgb> the object you wish to loot and then <rgb=#FFFF00>right-click</rgb> the items to loot them.
